DataElement.preferredName: Autoimmune Disease or Disorder Diagnosis Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no indicator relating to the investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of any abnormal condition of the body's autoimmunity that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of any abnormal condition of the body's autoimmunity that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to autoimmunity.:Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Concepts.definition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Property.preferredDefinition: The process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms.

Concepts.definition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does the patient have an auto
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have an autoimmune disease (e.g., history of inflammatory bowel disease, including ulcerative colitis and Crohn's  Disease, history of symptomatic disease (rheumatoid arthritis, systemic progressive sclerosis [scledroderma], systemic lupus erythematosus, autoimmune vasculitis [Wegener's Granulomatosis], CNS or motor neuropathy considered of autoimmune origin (eg. Guillain-Barre Syndrome and Myasthenia Gravis, multiple sclerosis))?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG_CRF_TEXT_1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a history of autoimmune disorder

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF TEXT_2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient have Sarcoid Syndrome proven by biopsy

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have autoimmune disease(s)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF_Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have active autoimmune disease that has required systemic treatment in the past 2 years

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have active autoimmune disease or documented history of autoimmune disease/syndrome (with the exception of vitiligo, resolved asthma/atopy, hypothyroidism stable on hormone replacement or Sjogren's syndrome)  that requires ongoing systemic steroids or systemic immunosuppressive agents?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF_Text_4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a history of, or current autoimmune disease?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF TEXT 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have any known autoimmune disease(s)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Any Autoimmune Diseases?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have active autoimmune disease or documented history of autoimmune disease or syndrome that requires ongoing systemic steroids or systemic immunosuppressive agents (except vitiligo, well controlled asthma or atopy, hypothyroidism stable on hormone replacement , or Sjogren's syndrome)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have an active auto-immune disease or history of autoimmune disease that might recur, which may affect vital organ function or require immune suppressive treatment including systemic corticosteroids?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have active autoimmune disease that has required systemic treatment within the past 2 years (i.e., with use of modifying agents, corticosteroids, or immunosuppressive drugs)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: New Autoimmune Disease Yes/No
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient developed an autoimmune disease?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a history or risk of active autoimmune disease that would exclude them from the study as defined in protocol section 3.3.6?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have active autoimmune disease requiring systemic treatment  (i.e. disease modifying agents, corticosteroids, or immunosuppressive drugs)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text_1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have an active autoimmune disease that required systemic treatment in the past two years?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG-CRF TEXT 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient actively receiving systemic cytotoxic chemotherapy, immunosuppressive, anti-monocyte or immunomodulatory therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text_2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have an active autoimmune disease or a history of autoimmune disease that might recur, which may affect vital organ function or require immune suppressive treatment including systemic corticosteroids?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text_3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have an active autoimmune disease that required systemic treatment in the past two years (i.e., with use of disease modifying agents, corticosteroids, or immunosuppressive drugs)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have an autoimmune disorder?

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP-Text-5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does participant have any Autoimmune diseases?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COF CRF Text 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have active autoimmune disease that has required systemic treatment in the past 12 months, or a documented history of clinically severe autoimmune disease, or a syndrome that requires systemic steroids or immunosuppressive agents?

DataElement.changeDescription: 6/2/16 jk added alt question text for UWI2014-03-01.
